channel.title: Orange Lounge Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where EVERY gamer has a voice
channel.itunes:author: OLR Studios
channel.itunes:keywords: video game, video games, video gaming, video game podcast, orange lounge radio, all games radio, xbox 360, xb360, playstation 3, ps3, wii, nintendo
channel.itunes:summary: Video Game podcast dedicated to what gamers really want to know, and the gamer lifestyle. An independent voice in a crowded world of video game podcasts, Orange Lounge Radio is dedicated to giving a forum for every gamer to have their voice. Hosted live weekly for the past nine years by DarkSakura, skie and LOKI, Orange Lounge Radio gives listeners the opportunity to interact directly with the show and give their feedback on the hot topics in the gaming industry thru live call-ins, a chatroom, e-mail, twitter and more. Winner of a Podcast Award for Best Gaming Podcast. Nominated for three Best of Live 365 awards. Tapes live on Sunday nights on the VOG Network. For more information visit http://www.orangeloungeradio.com

item.title: Orange Lounge Radio 459 - 6/3/12
item.itunes:author: Orange Lounge Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: It is a quiet calm before the E3 storm this week on Orange Lounge Radio. The show was taped prior to Sunday this week meaning no live chatters or callers unfortunately, but our hosts have plenty of pre-E3 buzz to dissect including: * Sony Cloud Service R
item.itunes:summary: It is a quiet calm before the E3 storm this week on Orange Lounge Radio. The show was taped prior to Sunday this week meaning no live chatters or callers unfortunately, but our hosts have plenty of pre-E3 buzz to dissect including:* Sony Cloud Service Rumors* Was Silent Hill HD made from incomplete code?* New Wii-U Functionality rumors* Doom 3 Remake* Skyrim: Dawnguard deatilsAll this and MORE on the show where EVERY gamer has a voice-- Orange Lounge Radio!LIVE on the VOG Network, Sunday nights at 6 Pacific, 9 Eastern www.vognetwork.comE-mail: mailbag@orangeloungeradio.com Twitter: @olr
item.description: It is a quiet calm before the E3 storm this week on Orange Lounge Radio. The show was taped prior to Sunday this week meaning no live chatters or callers unfortunately, but our hosts have plenty of pre-E3 buzz to dissect including:* Sony Cloud Service Rumors* Was Silent Hill HD made from incomplete code?* New Wii-U Functionality rumors* Doom 3 Remake* Skyrim: Dawnguard deatilsAll this and MORE on the show where EVERY gamer has a voice-- Orange Lounge Radio!LIVE on the VOG Network, Sunday nights at 6 Pacific, 9 Eastern www.vognetwork.comE-mail: mailbag@orangeloungeradio.com Twitter: @olr
item.itunes:keywords: video games, video game, video gaming, e3, sony, playstation 3, ps3, cloud gaming, silent hill, wii-u, nintendo, wii, doom 3, skyrim, dawnguard
